DOC.brief_summary: This is a three-year study in subjects with axillary hyperhidrosis involving injection of Botulinum Toxin Type A into the axilla to reduce sweating.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Using Botulinum Toxin Type A in Patients With Axillary Hyperhidrosis
DOC.criteria: Marked axillary hyperhidrosis Previous use of botulinum toxin for hyperhidrosis
